mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, N.* FROM (SELECT NUM, WRITER, TITLE, REGDATE, HIT FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NUM DESC) N) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NUM, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, REGDATE, HIT) VALUES (BOARDSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents} WHERE NUM = #{num}
